hero.headline: Apne Kaam Ko Aasani Se Sambhaalay
hero.subheadline: Sada aur taaqatwar kaam ka nizam sikhne waloun, free lancers aur teams ke liye. Mukammal taur pe muft. Credit card ki zaroorat nahi.
hero.trustline: Credit card ki zaroorat nahi • Aaj hi shuroo karain

problem.title: Kaam Ko Munazzam Rakhne Mein Mushkil
problem.description: Aksar hum munazzam rehne mein mushkil mehsoos karte hain. Ye woh masail hain jo hum se ro bru hain:

items.title: Farmoosh Shuda Sur Muddat
items.description: Kaam ghayib ho jate hain aur sur muddat khatam ho jati hai. Aap hamesha piche rehte hain.

items.title: Muntashar Kaam
items.description: Kaam notes, e-mails aur alag alag apps mein hote hain. Koi markazee jagah nahi.

items.title: Ghair Wazi Tarjeehat
items.description: Tarjeehat ke bagher, sab kuch aham lagta hai. Aap ghair aham kaam par waqt zaai karte hain.

items.title: Dimagi Tawanai Ka Zayaa
items.description: Kaam ko dastee tareeqe se sambhalna aapki tawajjuh ko khatam kar deta hai.

solution.title: Hal: Saf Aur Sada Kaam Ka Nizam
solution.description: Evolution of Todo aapko ek sada aur taaqatwar dashboard deta hai.

highlights.title: Saf Dashboard
highlights.description: Apne tamam kaam ek nazar mein dekhain. Koi afratafri nahi.

highlights.title: Aasan Kaam Ki Takhleeq
highlights.description: Seconds mein kaam shaamil karain. Sur muddat, tarjeehat aur tags set karain.

highlights.title: Fori Wazahat
highlights.description: Tarjeehat, sur muddat ya tags ke lihaz se munazzam karain.

features.title: Taaqatwar Khususiyat Aapke Liye
features.description: Munazzam aur productive rehne ke liye sab kuch.

items.title: Fori Kaam Ki Takhleeq
items.description: Tarjeehat aur sur muddat ke saath kaam shaamil karain.

items.title: Zehan Dar Sur Muddat
items.description: Sur muddat khatam hone se pehle yaad dihani hasil karain.

items.title: Tarjeehat Ki Satehain
items.description: Kaam ko aham, darmiani ya kam tarjeehat dain.

items.title: Tags Aur Filtering
items.description: Apne tags se munazzam karain. Talash karain.

items.title: Kesir Lisani Muawinaat
items.description: English, Urdu ya Roman Urdu mein istemal karain.

items.title: AI Ke Liye Tayar
items.description: Mustaqbil ke liye banaya gaya hai. AI khususiyat jald aa rahi hain.

howItWorks.title: Teen Sada Aqdamat Mein Kaise Kaam Karta Hai

steps.title: Apne Kaam Shaamil Karain
steps.description: Kaam shaamil karain, tarjeehat aur sur muddat muqarrar karain.

steps.title: Track Aur Mukammal Karain
steps.description: Apni taraqqi dekhain, kaam mukammal karain.

preview.title: Evolution of Todo Ko Amali Dekhain
preview.description: Sulahiyat Ke Liye Design Kiya Gaya Sada Interface.

screenshots.title: Kaam Banane Ki Window
screenshots.description: Tayz Aur Aasan Kaam Ki Takhleeq

targetAudience.title: Ye Kaun Ke Liye Hai?
targetAudience.description: Evolution of Todo har us shakhs ke liye hai jo munazzam rehna chahta hai.

personas.title: Talib-e-Ilm
personas.description: Tayyin kaam, projects aur sur muddat. Apni padhai munazzam rakhain.

personas.title: Free Lancer
personas.description: Mutaaddad clients aur projects. Kabhi sur muddat na chhod'ain.

personas.title: Developer
personas.description: Kharaabiyon, khususiyat aur kamon ko track karain.

personas.title: Chhoti Team
personas.description: Taawun karain. Her koi ek safa par rahe.

pricing.title: Hamesha Muft Shuroo Karain
pricing.description: Mukammal taur pe muft istemal karain. Koi poshida charge nahi.
pricing.highlight: Muft. Hamesha. Bunyadi khususiyat ke liye.

finalCta.headline: Kontrolmein Aane Ke Liye Tayar Hain?
finalCta.description: Munazzam Karne Mein Waqat Zaai Karna Band Karain. Aham Chizon Par Tawajjuh Dain.
finalCta.trustline: Muft Account. Credit Card Nahi. Jab Chahain Mansukh Karain.
